attributes.action: Make politicians accountable for what they say they do  do but don’t deliver
attributes.additional_details:
When there is a general election there is a lot of rhetoric about what a new Government says they are going to do just to win votes - when in power they seldom deliver what they promise- in fact most of them do precisely the opposite.

New legislation should be brought in that holds lobbying parties and politicians accountable for what they say they will do. If they don’t deliver on their promises they should be forced to resign.

The British public have had enough of these constant lies!
attributes.background:
We have had enough of Government lies. It’s time to demand new legislation to make it illegal for a Government to say they’re going to do things for the people but turn around to do the opposite.

It’s unfair, its unjust and ridicules British democracy.
